Description:
P/SPD020322/01-312331712
The scaffolding in question is not a safe place of work due to the lack of edge protection during the construction of the central partition wall and the open edge where the garage doors will subsequently be installed because you have failed to take suitable and sufficient measures to prevent, so far is as reasonably practicable, persons falling a distance liable to cause personal injury in that, there are open edges where persons are working during construction of the said garage buildings
